name: vigorously

in a way that is very forceful or energetic: Environmentalists and local government officials have vigorously opposed the project. He vigorously denied the accusations.
in a way that is healthy and strong: Keep cutting the grass for as long as it grows vigorously. Plants have to compete with the vigorously growing weeds for light, water, and nutrients. See
